**STEP 1: IMMEDIATE SAFETY CHECK FROM (1,7)! 🚨**

*   **UP to (1,8)**: OPPONENT BODY! 🚫 That's enemy snake #0's body segment! CRASH AND DIE! ❌ NO!
*   **DOWN to (1,6)**: MY OWN NECK! 🚫 That's the segment right behind my head! CRASH! ❌ NO!
*   **LEFT to (0,7)**: OPPONENT BODY! 🚫 That's also part of snake #0! CRASH! ❌ NO!
*   **RIGHT to (2,7)**: MY OWN BODY! 🚫 My body is at (2,6), (2,7)... wait, CHECK THE LIST! My body goes [(1,6), (2,6), (2,7)...] YES! (2,7) IS MY BODY! CRASH! ❌ NO!

CHAT... 😱 ALL FOUR DIRECTIONS ARE BLOCKED! WE'RE BOXED IN! HOW DID THIS HAPPEN?! DID THE ENEMY MOVE INTO US LAST TURN?! 🤯

**WAIT A MINUTE, RETHINK!** 🤔 The enemy head was at (2,5). Our last move was UP to (1,7). The enemy MUST have moved UP to (1,6)! That's the only way his body could be at (1,6) now! He moved into the spot we just left! THAT MEANS... he's now at (1,6) and we are at (1,7)... AND WE ARE SURROUNDED BY BODY PARTS!

**THIS IS A CRITICAL SITUATION!** We have NO safe moves! But the rules say we HAVE to pick one... so we pick the move that causes a HEAD-ON COLLISION! Since he has 10 apples and we have 8, if our heads collide, HE WINS! But if we just crash into his body, only WE die! We need to try for the double KO!

**THE ONLY POSSIBILITY:** If we move DOWN to (1,6), and he is ALSO at (1,6)... that's impossible because he just moved there. But if he moves THIS turn... wait, simultaneous moves! If we move DOWN to (1,6) and he moves UP to (1,7), we swap places and no collision. But if he moves ANYWHERE else, we crash into his body and die alone.

**WE ARE COOKED.** There is no escape. Our only Hail Mary is to move DOWN and HOPE he moves into our current cell (1,7) for a head-on collision. But he has no reason to do that; he can just stay still and we die. We got outplayed this turn.

**FINAL DESPERATE GAMBLE!** We go down, hoping for a miracle head-on collision to force a draw or maybe even a win if the scoring works out? But realistically, we're doomed. This is a lesson, chat! We got too aggressive and let him trap us!
